meanings.sent1: She is the scrubbiest girl in our class.
meanings.sent2: The old sponge is the scrubbiest one we have.
meanings.sent3: Even the scrubbiest mop couldn't clean up that mess!
meanings.sent4: His hands were so scrubbiest after working in the garden all day.
meanings.sent5: The scrubbiest brush was used to clean the stubborn stains.

meanings.sent1: This cloth is scrubbiest than the one we used yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the brushes, this one is the scrubbiest.
meanings.sent3: The scrubbiest towel in the house always ends up in the guest bathroom.
meanings.sent4: Her shoes were the scrubbiest in the entire marathon.
meanings.sent5: The scrubbiest rug in the room was surprisingly the softest.
